hero.title: Your Card Program. Zero Interchange Fees.
hero.subtitle: Launch your own white-label payment card. A complete platform for banks, financial institutions, and merchants who want to innovate without the traditional costs.

features.title: A Revolutionary Payment Platform
features.subtitle: Designed to optimize your revenue and build customer loyalty.
features.feature1_desc: Eliminate a major cost source and increase your margins on every transaction with our private payment processor.
features.feature2_desc: Strengthen your brand with custom debit, credit, or prepaid cards bearing your logo, with no initial development fees.
features.feature3_desc: Offer credit, debit, and prepaid products on a single card, allowing you to create unique offers for your customers.
features.feature4_desc: Benefit from simple integration and expert support based in Quebec to launch your card program quickly.

howItWorks.title: A Launch in 3 Key Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Our integration process is simple, fast, and transparent.
howItWorks.step1_desc: Together, we define your needs to create a custom card program that meets your business objectives.
howItWorks.step2_desc: Our technical teams integrate our platform with your systems and customize the cards according to your brand.
howItWorks.step3_desc: We support you during the launch of your program and provide you with the tools to ensure its success.

testimonials.title: What Our Partners Are Saying
testimonials.testimonial1_quote: Integrating the Inglis Dominium solution allowed us to launch an innovative credit card in record time, while significantly reducing our operational costs.
testimonials.testimonial2_quote: The white-label prepaid card program has transformed our loyalty program. It's a powerful marketing tool and a new source of revenue for us.

cta.title: Ready to launch your own payment solution?
cta.subtitle: Contact our team of experts to discover how Inglis Dominium can transform your business.

welcome.title: Welcome to Inglis Dominium
welcome.p1: Inglis Dominium is an independent payment network that allows financial institutions, businesses, and companies to issue their own virtual and physical payment cards.
welcome.p2: By continuing, you acknowledge that you have read and accepted our <0>Terms of Use</0> and our <1>Privacy Policy</1>, which governs the use of your personal and corporate information.

cardExplained.title: How Our Cards Work
cardExplained.subtitle: Discover the unique structure and logic behind every Inglis Dominium card.
cardExplained.interactiveHint: Click on a section of the card number to learn more.
cardExplained.initials_desc: The first two letters correspond to the user's first and last name initials. For example, for Léa Tremblay, LT is used.
cardExplained.issuer_title: NNNNNN: Issuer ID and Card Type
cardExplained.issuer_desc_1: The first six digits are divided into two parts.
cardExplained.issuer_desc_2: The first five digits (e.g., 00000) represent the card issuer's ID (organization, service, internal entity).
cardExplained.issuer_desc_3: The sixth digit (e.g., 0) corresponds to the card type (Debit, credit, prepaid, test, etc.).
cardExplained.random_letters_desc: This two-letter block is randomly generated for each card. It serves to increase entropy without adding excessive visual complexity. Example: QZ.
cardExplained.unique_id_desc: This seven-digit block is a unique identifier specific to each card. Example: 0000000.
cardExplained.check_digit_desc_1: The check digit is calculated using the Luhn algorithm. The entire alphanumeric sequence is converted into a full numeric sequence for the calculation.
cardExplained.check_digit_desc_2: Letters are converted to numbers based on their position in the alphabet by adding 9: A=10, B=11, ..., Z=35. For example, LT becomes 2129 and QZ becomes 2635.
cardExplained.check_digit_desc_3: The sequence to be validated for LT-000000-QZ-0000000 is therefore: 212900000026350000000. The Luhn algorithm is applied to this sequence to calculate the final digit (e.g., 7).
cardExplained.expiration_desc: The card's expiration is a maximum of 4 years (48 months). It is formatted as MM/YY. Example: 06/28.
cardExplained.cvv_desc: The CVV is a three-digit code randomly generated for transaction security. Example: 915.
cardExplained.summary_desc: The initials identify the cardholder, the first digits identify the issuer and product type. The following blocks make each card unique. The check digit ensures integrity, the expiration provides a time limit, and the CVV completes the security.
cardExplained.combinations_desc_1: The system allows for the generation of a virtually unlimited number of unique cards.
cardExplained.combinations_total_2: With expiration (48 months) and CVV (1000): ... × 48 × 1000 = 2.19 x 10²³
cardExplained.combinations_final: After validation by the Luhn algorithm (which validates 1/10 of the numbers), we get approximately 2.19 x 10²² valid combinations. This system allows for the issuance of tens of sextillions of cards with a clear logical structure and internal validation.

creditFiles.title: Credit Files
creditFiles.subtitle: View and manage credit files here.
creditFiles.directAccessDesc: Open the secure interface to directly query the credit bureau database using a social insurance number.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account and institution settings here.
settings.cardProgramsDesc: Manage your existing card programs or create new ones.

cardPrograms.title: Card Programs
cardPrograms.listDesc: Here is the list of all active and inactive card programs for your institution.
cardPrograms.deleteDesc: This action cannot be undone. The card program will be permanently deleted.

newCardProgram.title: Create a New Card Program
newCardProgram.formDesc: Create your own payment card on our network. Customize every aspect to perfectly match your brand and needs.
newCardProgram.step1_desc: Give your program a name and a unique identifier.
newCardProgram.step2_desc: Choose the card type and configure its financial settings.
newCardProgram.step3_desc_fees: Configure the fee structure for this program.
newCardProgram.feeNoneDesc: No fees will be applied. We will not charge anything.
newCardProgram.feeAnnualDesc: An annual fee will be charged to the end-user. You will be charged a fee of $15 CAD per year.
newCardProgram.feePerTransactionUserDesc: A fee will be applied to each user transaction. We take a 0.5% commission on each transaction.
newCardProgram.feeCustomDesc: Define your own issuance or transaction fees.
newCardProgram.step4_desc_bin: Choose whether to use a shared BIN or request your own dedicated BIN.
newCardProgram.binSharedDesc: Ideal for getting started quickly. You will use an issuer identifier shared with other programs.
newCardProgram.binDedicatedDesc: For full control and a unique brand. Your own issuer identifier (additional fees and delays may apply).
newCardProgram.step5_desc_design: Customize the appearance of your card.
newCardProgram.step6_desc_review: Review your program details before finalizing.
newCardProgram.termsContent:
By creating this card program, you (the 'Issuer') agree to the following terms and conditions with Inglis Dominium (the 'Provider').

1. **Issuer Responsibilities**: You are fully responsible for managing end-users, complying with applicable financial regulations (including AML/CFT), and communicating terms and conditions to your cardholders.

2. **BIN Assignment**: If you have selected a Dedicated BIN, the Provider will assign you a unique Bank Identification Number for your exclusive use. If you have selected a Shared BIN, your program will use a BIN common to other programs on the Provider's network.

3. **Fees and Billing**: You agree to the selected fee structure. The Provider reserves the right to collect the agreed-upon fees (annual fees, transaction commissions, etc.) according to the terms of your main service agreement. All fees are in Canadian Dollars (CAD) and are non-refundable.

4. **Compliance and Security**: You agree to use the Provider's platform in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations. You are responsible for the security of your cardholders' data within your own systems.

5. **Limitation of Liability**: The Provider will not be liable for any loss or damage resulting from your management of the card program, including fraud, user payment defaults, or operational errors on your part.

By checking the box below, you confirm that you have read, understood, and accepted these terms and conditions, and that you are authorized to bind your institution to this agreement.
newCardProgram.termsCheckbox: I confirm that I have read and agree to the terms and conditions.
